Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: All managers are losers, they are the most expendable pieces of furniture on the face of the Earth

Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: By the time you know what to do, you're too old to do it

Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Hitting is fifty percent above the shoulders

Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: If I was being paid thirty-thousand dollars a year, the very least I could do was hit .400

Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I've found that you don't need to wear a necktie if you can hit

Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: They invented the All-Star game for Willie Mays

Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: God gets you to the plate, but once your there your on your own

Quote.Author: Ted Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to hit the fastball to play in the big leagues

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more apt to cry at something beautiful than at something sad

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing fools you better than the lie you tell yourself

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing beautiful things is its own reward

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: Magicians have done controlled testing in human perception for thousands of years

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: Magic's about understanding - and then manipulating - how viewers digest the sensory information

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: When a magician lets you notice something on your own, his lie becomes impenetrable

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: People take reality for granted

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality seems so simple. We just open our eyes and there it is. But that doesn't mean it is simple

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: Onstage, I find absolutely nothing but exhilaration in not talking

Quote.Author: Teller
Quote.QuoteValue: Magic is an art form where you lie and tell people you are lying

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot emphasize enough the importance of a good teacher

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a visual thinker, not a language-based thinker. My brain is like Google Images

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: Some teachers just have a knack for working with autistic children. Other teachers do not have it

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: I know a number of autistic adults that are doing extremely well on Prozac

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was younger, I was looking for this magic meaning of life

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: I am also a believer in an integrated treatment approach to autism

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: Autism is an extremely variable disorder

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: I obtain great satisfaction out of using my intellect

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: If I did not have my work, I would not have any life

Quote.Author: Temple Grandin
Quote.QuoteValue: Autism is part of who I am

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing worse than a liar is a liar that's also a hypocrite!

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: In memory everything seems to happen to music

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't stand a naked light bulb, any more than I can a rude remark or a vulgar action

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: When so many are lonely as seem to be lonely, it would be inexcusably selfish to be lonely alone

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: Why did I write? Because I found life unsatisfactory

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: All of us are guinea pigs in the laboratory of God. Humanity is just a work in progress

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: To be free is to have achieved your life

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: We're all of us guinea pigs in the laboratory of God. Humanity is just a work in progress

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against betrayal

Quote.Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: For time is the longest distance between two places

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: They are so knowing, that they know nothing

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: You believe that easily which you hope for earnestly

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: What harsh judges fathers are to all young men!

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: In fact nothing is said that has not been said before

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a human being; nothing human can be alien to me

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: Too much liberty corrupts us all

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: Where there's life, there's hope

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: You can take a chance with any man who pays his bills on time

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: You're a wise person if you can easily direct your attention to what ever needs it

Quote.Author: Terence
Quote.QuoteValue: To touch a sore is to renew one's grief

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: Take a step back, evaluate what is important, and enjoy life

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: I thought, 'If I can't be prom queen, I can dance 'Les Sylphide.'

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been this insane. Isn't that interesting?

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: I have been off the motorcycles for about 20 years now, but that doesn't mean I can't still do it

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: With this disease it is so easy to throw in the towel, and that is the worst thing we can do

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: If you get a diagnosis, get on a therapy, keep a good attitude and keep your sense of humor

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to lift your head up out of the mud and just do it

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: I have an enormous fondness for delicious food. It's very comforting

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: God is in all - I believe in God, yes. And I believe God is in us

Quote.Author: Teri Garr
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to laugh as much as possible and enjoy the company of people who can make me laugh

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Evil is often supposed to be without rhyme or reason

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Today, nostalgia is almost as unacceptable as racism

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Deconstruction insists not that truth is illusory but that it is institutional

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: For Aristotle, goodness is a kind of prospering in the precarious affair of being human

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: The past can be used to renew the present, not just to bury it

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Postmodernism is among other things a sick joke at the expense of revolutionary avant-gardism

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing in human life is inherently private

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: The frontier between public and private shifts from time to time and culture to culture

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: It is true that too much belief can be bad for your health

Quote.Author: Terry Eagleton
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans use the word 'dream' as often as psychoanalysts do

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: In ancient times cats were worshipped as gods; they have not forgotten this

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: The pen is mightier than the sword if the sword is very short, and the pen is very sharp

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes it is better to light a flamethrower than curse the darkness

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: This isn't life in the fast lane, it's life in the oncoming traffic

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: Only in our dreams are we free. The rest of the time we need wages

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: Five exclamation marks, the sure sign of an insane mind

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: Taxation is just a sophisticated way of demanding money with menaces

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing is the most fun you can have by yourself

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: Opera happens because a large number of things amazingly fail to go wrong

Quote.Author: Terry Pratchett
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom without limits is just a word

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody really knows what they look like. The mirror shows you only what you want to see

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Time flies like an arrow - but fruit flies like a banana

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not big on the pasty because they say the pastry in the pasty can bring on indigestion

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so proud to do it - there's nothing else I do that compares to 'Children in Need.'

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to say, without getting up on a soapbox, I find these reality shows absolutely disgusting

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: Television contracts the imagination and radio expands it

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been the kind of person who leaves parties early to catch the last bus home

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm on the university board in Limerick, so I visit the city often

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a happy temperament: a bit like 'Rebecca of Sunnybrook Farm.'

Quote.Author: Terry Wogan
Quote.QuoteValue: I speak some French, Spanish, a little German and Gaelic

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: Since I was little, I've had that vision of a businesswoman inside me

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been able to transform happiness and pain and sorrow and tears into positive energy

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody has their own story; everybody has their own journey

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is something that is cultivated

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: You are the only one who can create an incredible world around you, or destroy yourself

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very strong woman

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: Kmart appreciates and supports exclusive brands

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: Music has no limits, borders or ages

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born a woman, but I have a man's soul

Quote.Author: Thalia
Quote.QuoteValue: All I want to do now is to pamper myself and to be peppered with people who I love

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: I hold grudges, but I can't hate nobody; that's not my nature

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: Every true hustler knows that you cannot hustle forever. You will go to jail eventually

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up in the streets of Bed-Stuy, it was hard, yo

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: The second time I went to jail, I was like, 'Okay, this is not the move.'

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm making music for the people. If y'all love the music, y'all gonna buy the music

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta mature, you know

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't even say Puff and me are like brothers, 'cause we closer than that

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't never stop nobody, can't knock nobody hustle

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: '96 is the year of love. We all need to pull together

Quote.Author: The Notorious B.I.G.
Quote.QuoteValue: My real life helped me sell a lot of records

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: I make good music for long journeys

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the most boring person to talk to

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: In the beginning, I was very insecure. I hated how I looked in pictures

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: When people meet me, they say that I'm really kind - contrary to a lot of my music

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be remembered as iconic and different

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean... in life... what relationship is easy?

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I'd ever apologise for music I make, no

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet, man, is a beautiful thing

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Eastern Promises' is great

Quote.Author: The Weeknd
Quote.QuoteValue: Image, lyrics, content, storytelling, cohesive body of work - that's Prince to me

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom would be not to choose between black and white but to abjure such prescribed choices

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: Work while you work, play while you play - this is a basic rule of repressive self-discipline

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: The poor are prevented from thinking by the discipline of others, the rich by their own

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: The task of art today is to bring chaos into order

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no love that is not an echo

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: The gods look in pleasure on penitent sinners

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: Life has become the ideology of its own absence

Quote.Author: Theodor Adorno
Quote.QuoteValue: None of the abstract concepts comes closer to fulfilled utopia than that of eternal peace

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: Shopping at any level is a bit of therapy for my medulla oblongata

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: I connect to SpongeBob in a way; like, that's the homie. He can chill on the corner with me

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: While my cousins were gang-banging, I was trying to learn what the Internet was about

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe in yourself and believe in magic

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, my brand is luxury, it's art, it's women, it's raw, it's urban

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: Creating the album 'VIBES' has been the biggest life lesson I have ever learned

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: Go to American Apparel; they have all of the colors of socks

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: I always imagined how cool it would be to be the face of a Gap campaign!

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people have style without even knowing it!

Quote.Author: Theophilus London
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe your atmosphere and your surroundings create a mind state for you

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: In tough times, everyone has to take their share of the pain

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: Like Indiana Jones, I don't like snakes - though that might lead some to ask why I'm in politics

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been clear that Brexit means Brexit

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: I actually think I think better in high heels

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: For voters what matters is what government actually delivers for them

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: Targets don't fight crime

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: I will be ruthless in cutting out waste, streamlining structures and improving efficiency

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a counter-terrorism regime that is proportionate, focused and transparent

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: If the police need more help to do their work, I will not hesitate in granting it to them

Quote.Author: Theresa May
Quote.QuoteValue: Anti-social behaviour still blights lives, wrecks communities and provides a pathway to criminality

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: The huge problem in our society is the enormous ignorance of the ideas that underlie modern art

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: I've grown up a little bit. I understand the importance of the negotiation. It is a collective act

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: The multiplicity of ideas is what I'm interested in

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Look around at day-to-day life for ideas, and it finds its way into your work

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Large-scale public projects require the agreement of large numbers of people

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: Descriptions of my work depress me. They make me feel pinned down

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: For me the meaning of my work is much more fluid

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: My buildings don't speak in words but by means of their own spaciousness

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been such an outsider my whole life

Quote.Author: Thom Mayne
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm interested in conflict and confrontation

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Intensity' is a good word. It's like ambition, if it's not ambition at expense of someone else

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: If you just focus on producing good outcomes, all that other stuff sorts itself out

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the problems fundamental to health care in the United States is access and cost

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: If Israel did not exist, the United Nations would go out of business

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad would much rather work a couple jobs than be on government assistance

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been a paperboy, a short-order cook, a warehouse clerk, and, eventually, a partner at IBM

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to make some hard decisions when you're speaker

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: Greece has to stay in the euro

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: A Greek exit from the E.U. and the euro would mean the Greek economy would be difficult to sustain

Quote.Author: Thom Tillis
Quote.QuoteValue: You're always going to have your detractors

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the nicest thing to do with a guitar is just look at it

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the most important thing about music is the sense of escape

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: And I know I'm paranoid and neurotic, I've made a career out of it

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: At home I've got a very puerile, juvenile sense of humour

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sometimes all the charities are doing is mopping up the blood. It's a shame

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: It is difficult to make political art work

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone needs to tell the truth, but it shouldn't be my job

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: You think I have the responsibilty... I have the responsibility to give the fans a good time!

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up believing that I was fundamentally powerless

Quote.Author: Thom Yorke
Quote.QuoteValue: Being in a band turns you into a child and keeps you there

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: How seldom we weigh our neighbor in the same balance with ourselves

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: Be assured that if you knew all, you would pardon all

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: At the Day of Judgment, we shall not be asked what we have read, but what we have done

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: Who has a harder fight than he who is striving to overcome himself

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: The acknowledgment of our weakness is the first step in repairing our loss

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: Great tranquility of heart is his who cares for neither praise nor blame

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: We usually know what we can do, but temptation shows us who we are

Quote.Author: Thomas a Kempis
Quote.QuoteValue: Of two evils, the less is always to be chosen

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing except the mint can make money without advertising

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: The best portraits are those in which there is a slight mixture of caricature

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: The measure of a man's real character is what he would do if he knew he would never be found out

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: Your Constitution is all sail and no anchor

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather be poor in a cottage full of books than a king without the desire to read

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: Few of the many wise apothegms which have been uttered have prevented a single foolish action

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: The knowledge of the theory of logic has no tendency whatever to make men good reasoners

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: He had a wonderful talent for packing thought close, and rendering it portable

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are never so likely to settle a question rightly as when they discuss it freely

Quote.Author: Thomas Babington Macaulay
Quote.QuoteValue: The gallery in which the reporters sit has become a fourth estate of the realm

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: A mask of gold hides all deformities

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: Golden slumbers kiss your eyes, Smiles awake you when you rise

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: Age is like love, it cannot be hid

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: Arguments, like children, should be like the subject that begets them

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: The calmest husbands make the stormiest wives

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: This age thinks better of a gilded fool Than of a threadbare saint in wisdom's school

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: Were there no women, men might live like gods

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: This principle is old, but true as fate, Kings may love treason, but the traitor hate

Quote.Author: Thomas Dekker
Quote.QuoteValue: O what a heaven is love! O what a hell!

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no substitute for face-to-face reporting and research

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't visit the bad neighborhoods, the bad neighborhoods are going to visit you

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was in Bangalore, India, the Silicon Valley of India, when I realized that the world was flat

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Do you know what my favorite renewable fuel is? An ecosystem for innovation

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: We are led by lawyers who do not understand either technology or balance sheets

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: The historical debate is over. The answer is free-market capitalism

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: The hidden hand of the market will never work without a hidden fist

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: McDonald's cannot flourish without McDonnell Douglas, the designer of the F-15

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, the world is now flat for publishing as well

Quote.Author: Thomas Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to become energy independent or at least aspire to that

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have one true friend you have more than your share

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Great hopes make great men

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Health is not valued till sickness comes

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Memory is the treasure house of the mind wherein the monuments thereof are kept and preserved

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: If it were not for hopes, the heart would break

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: Zeal without knowledge is fire without light

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: With devotion's visage and pious action we do sugar o'er the devil himself

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: All things are difficult before they are easy

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: A good horse should be seldom spurred

Quote.Author: Thomas Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: One that would have the fruit must climb the tree

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I work in show business - there's nothing that shocks me anymore!

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Charleston is an amazing place. I probably didn't appreciate it enough when I was growing up

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I do love golf

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing better for kids than a bucket and shovel at the beach

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I never envy the guys who get attention for partying too much or behaving badly

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: Prague is not rife in Asian culture

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up across the marsh from The Citadel

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a fine line between something that's gratuitous, that's unnecessary

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I joke that, 'Give us forty-two minutes, and we'll get your bad guy for you.'

Quote.Author: Thomas Gibson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it'd be a lot of fun to jump back into the comedy world

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: Time changes everything except something within us which is always surprised by change

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a condition worse than blindness, and that is, seeing something that isn't there

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: No one can read with profit that which he cannot learn to read with pleasure

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: And yet to every bad there is a worse

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: If Galileo had said in verse that the world moved, the inquisition might have let him alone

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: The main object of religion is not to get a man into heaven, but to get heaven into him

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: Aspect are within us, and who seems most kingly is king

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the family face; flesh perishes, I live on

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: Some folk want their luck buttered

Quote.Author: Thomas Hardy
Quote.QuoteValue: You can do anything with bayonets except sit on them

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are the money of fools

Quote.Author: Thomas Hobbes
Quote.QuoteValue: The condition of man... is a condition of war of everyone against everyone
